name: Choker: Chess & Poker
storyline: Some of the biggest names in chess and poker are already playing this mind-bogglingly deep game. Players include Grandmaster Hikaru Nakamura, International Master Eric Rosen, Grandmaster Simon Williams, Mr Chess of Brazil - Raffael Santos AKA Raffael Chess, International master Anna Rudolf, Woman FIDE Master, Alexandra Botez, International Poker Player, Matt Staples, High Stakes Roller, Bill Perkins and many more! Whether you want to play Xadrez, Ajedrez Schach or another of your favourite stars, you'll need tactics, skills and a problem-solving mind at the ready to win the battle! This isn’t your average multiplayer chess game or poker game, this is Choker!
summary: Choker combines two of the world's favorite card and board games for the ultimate challenge. Chess + Poker = Choker. Ready for high stakes chess? For the poker phase, you'll need cunning and cool calculation. In chess, you'll need strategy and brilliance. To win the pot, you need it all.
